snippet.title: Kingdom of Atham - Preview trailer!
snippet.description:
KoA CotC short for "Kingdom of Atham: Crown of the Champions" is a PVE/PVP Fantasy Survival Game with many "RPG" aspects.

Your goal, Champion is to find the remnants of the Crown and restore balance to Atham. Build your fortress, find allies and save the realms. Crafting and fighting your way to honor and glory. The Darkness is your worst enemy; the Light ... a lost friend.

If you'd like to get in touch with the KoA Community Please use on of the links below or leave a comment! 

---------------LINKS---------------
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1676380/Kingdom_of_Atham_Crown_of_the_Champions/
Website: https://kingdomofatham.ca/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/G3j9hYBTDj
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MauveSofa
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Kingdom%20of%20Atham%3A%20Crown%20of%20the%20Champions
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/SofaMauveStudio/
